locations.name: Khanmor
locations.tooltip: A reclusive noocracy ruled by philosopher-kings. One of the world's two superpowers.

locations.name: Socordia
locations.tooltip: A techological stratocracy. Its military power is unrivaled. One of the world's two superpowers.

locations.name: The Glass Sea
locations.tooltip: Once a vast desert, at the end of the Watcher Crisis it was melted into glass.

locations.name: The Mire
locations.tooltip: A twisted, corrupt swamp stretching from the Spine of the world to the Sun Mountains. The Schemer keeps many lairs here.

locations.name: Witchvale
locations.tooltip: A great forest full of monstrous beasts and home to many lycanthropes.

locations.name: Idres
locations.tooltip: An ancient human kingdom struggling to maintain relevancy.

locations.name: Old Yazatli
locations.tooltip: A volcano-blasted wasteland. Currently the lair of the Epiphany.

locations.name: Tregemas
locations.tooltip: A mercantile powerhouse. The birthplace of firearms. Stronghold of the Storm.
